name: Chilling Coin
description: Chilling Coin (CHC) is a meme-powered BEP-20 token on BNB Smart Chain with 0% tax, fully renounced ownership, and locked liquidity. CHC aims to bring chill vibes and serious utility through community-driven development, NFTs, and future DeFi tools. With no central control and a growing global community, CHC is built for those who meme, chill, and believe in decentralized fun.
